title: Cheesy chicken and broccoli pasta
ingredients: ['450g uncooked spaghetti', '450g broccoli florets', '15g margarine', '450g skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets, cut into strips', '80g chopped onions', '1 (295g) tin condensed cream of chicken soup', '150ml milk', '150ml water', '85g cream cheese, cubed and softened', '60g grated Parmesan cheese']
